```{r}
library(Rlab)
library(locfit)
```

```{r}
expid_distance <- function(members,alpha,beta) {
  len <- length(members)
  G <- matrix(rep(0,len^2),len)
  
  for (i in 1:(len-1)) {
    for (j in (i+1):len) {
      
      i_coord <- members[i]
      j_coord <- members[j]
      
      prob <- expit(alpha-beta*(i_coord-j_coord)^2)
      
      edge <- rbern(1,prob)
      
      G[i,j] <- edge
      G[j,i] <- edge
    }
  }
  return(G)
}
```

```{r}
# sample run

members <- rnorm(10)

G2 <- expid_distance(members,10,15)
```
